website_summaries.verdict: With its impressive weight capacity and endless workout possibilities, this beast of a power rack is set to challenge even experienced lifters.
pros: High-quality tubular steel frame is sturdy and durable
Dual multi-grip pull-up bars and adjustable rubber dip handles offer versatility
Rubber-coated safety bars prevent banging and scratching

customer_reviews.title: well built
customer_reviews.text: well packaged, well built, well thought out I have owned free weight and cable systems for 30 years and I just picked this up to replace an aging half cage with upper and lower cables.just to give you a little background, I also have been in design and manufacturing as well as metal fabrication for almost 40 years. this unit impressed me, great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.author: Martin Borho

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT HOME CAGE
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing better than having your own gym quality equipment in your garage! This cage is better than the ones in our base gyms and I use it daily. It will hold whatever I throw at it in terms of weigh and movements. You must know that it is a little shorter that most gym cages because it is designed for home use but once you get used to curling your knees for dips and pull ups its all good! You can do nearly every body part in some form or another with this cage and an Olympic weight set! I don't have to go in early or stay late to get my workout in before or after work.
customer_reviews.author: Chief Hunter Killer

customer_reviews.title: overall great machine
customer_reviews.text: why the 3 star? the steel tubing doesnt seem that stout. The instructions state to thoroughly tighten the bolts before use. When I went to tighten the bolts I noticed that the 2x3 steel tubing was bending as I tightened the bolts up. I suggest when building this item to hand tight the bolts then give it a 1/4 to 1/2 turn more. I wouldn't tighten the bolts any more than that.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Have patience with delivery
customer_reviews.text: I'll be back to write a full review of the power cage with the lat pull-down accessory once I set it up. For now, please note that the delivery comes in several boxes over several days. The Amazon tracking system gives you one tracking number for the first box with nothing else, so when Box 1 of several is dropped off you have no way of finding out about the rest of the boxes. I spoke with the underlying manufacturer and she said if you don't have all your boxes within 48 to 72 hours of the first one then it's time to submit an inquiry. She was right, two days later the rest of the boxes showed up.
customer_reviews.author: WalpoleJoe

customer_reviews.title: Great power rack. If you are 6’4” or taller you may need to not get the lat pull down.
customer_reviews.text: Rack arrived in 2 days. That was amazing. The instructions were very easy to read and probably the best I’ve gotten for exercise equipment. This thing is a tank. Lat pull down is sturdy and smooth. Only draw back I could see is that I’m 6’3” and when I squat I am at the top hole on the rack. Also I noticed that the hooks that hold the lat pull down bar in place are like a half inch above my head when getting under the bar. For the money I highly recommend this thing if you aren’t too tall.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: A great home workout cage and added lat pull down
customer_reviews.text: First let me say the packaging was on of the best I've seen. Not a scratch anywhere. A parts were immaculate. The cage alone comes in 2 boxes and followed each other a day behind so don't go crazy. I would recommend using your own metric tools and FOLLOW the well written instructions. If you are mechanically challenged get someone who isn't. I put this and the lat pull down by myself and I'm 3/4 of a century old! Whomever designed this did a great job. All parts drilled perfectly and fit perfect. I definitely recommend their products. NOTE: they are lacking when it comes to answering the phone (minor)
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: The best power cage I have ever seen for home use
customer_reviews.text: I love this power cage. It was easy to assemble; it took about 75 minutes for me to put it together by myself. I can now work out at home in relative safety without a spotter and don't have to go to the gym. I bought the lat pull accessory unit and it fits perfectly and works smoother than many units found in gyms I have been a member of over the years. I'll never be as strong as when I was younger but this allows me to workout without the danger of a loaded bar falling on my chest due to a set to failure.
customer_reviews.author: Taz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, stop researching, pull the trigger on this, you won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: thing kicks ass, I highly recommend. I did DAYS of research before I pulled the trigger and I am super picky. This rack met all my needs and makes me happy. I squat a hell of a lot more often that i used to because of the convenience of having it in my garage. Home Gyms are totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is well worth the money. First off when it arrived the packaging was awesome!!! I mean it prob took me longer to unwrap everything than it did to put together. I was very surprised. Then the way they have the instructions payed out and hardware package was dummy proof. With the help of my impact gun I assembled it by myself in about an hr and I was not rushing at all. Everything lined up as it should and went together with ease. I highly recommend this even if you are looking for a cheaper rack, spend the extra jangle and you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Seniramsu132

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and a family of roaches came out, the most disgusting thing ever. I don't care how good the product is, I'm grossed out Edit : I'm willing to ignore a few roaches because of how fantastic this cage is. It feels just as sturdy and safe as the one in my gym. I have literally no complaints other than the safety bars being a pain in the butt to align, wish there was a better solution there
customer_reviews.author: Talal916

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product... no customer support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this power rack on November 26th for $709 and two days later I saw the price drop over $100. I tried calling the manufacturer twice but, no one picks up when your press 4 to talk to an agent. I love this rack, I don't love that I overpaid for it.
customer_reviews.author: nick tzoumas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the money
customer_reviews.text: After extensive shopping around, I’m happy to say this is the best quality for the dollar I found. Great product that I’m still happy with after 8 months of daily use by 2 people. I definitely recommend the pulley attachment as It allows a lot of workout options.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousMan

customer_reviews.title: Great setup but dip bars need to be re enforced
customer_reviews.text: Rack is great and the lag pull down is awesome. Built it by myself. If you have a socket set it’ll go a lot faster then using the tools they give you. Took a star off because the dip bars are already bent. I am fat (6’ 240 pounds) but not so fat a cant do dips. Bar unfortunately has bent and I used a pipe wrench to bend it back. Won’t last forever and will have to get a new one eventually
customer_reviews.author: George Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I'm super excited about my new home gym
customer_reviews.text: This review is being written immediately after assembling this item. It took me about 2.5 hours to assemble with a helper. I used a metric socket set to tighten all of the bolts- this was time consuming, but everything went together as designed. It is a very high quality squat rack. I also bought the lat pull down attachment. The materials and welds are all top quality. The rack is solid. I purchased a very high quality adjustable bench to go with it as well as Olympic bars and plates. I'm super excited about my new home gym. Will add to this review once I have had the chance to use the rack.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally well made
customer_reviews.text: I'm always a little weary ordering cheaper products when they are made of metal because often times its cheaper metal and not very sturdy. Based on the other reviews I decided to go for it, and they were right. This feels very high quality and ive been using it for a couple months now with no problems and have no doubt it will last for decades. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Well engineered lifting cage
customer_reviews.text: This is a well engineered lifting cage. I purchased this power cage based on reviews left by others. Everything about this piece of equipment is well thought out for durability and longevity. The pulley system is solid with bearings not bushings. Even the packaging of this power cage was carefully thought out. I paid an extra $14 for one day shipping and it was delivered on time - 4 large boxes! Thank you Amazon... Couldn't be more pleased.. It took 2 hours to assemble. They provide tools but using your own ratchet and box wrenches makes assembly smooth. $600 well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee, lunch and crab

customer_reviews.title: Perfect piece of exercise equipment!
customer_reviews.text: This rack showed up super fast, just a few days afyer ordering. The unit was packaged perfectly absolutely no shipping damage. It goes together quite easily with perfect instructions. The bolts are packaged with the part number and the step number. After reading reviews of other units and reading the reviews on this unit it was an easy decision. Now that it is assembled I know i made the right choice. You absolutely cannot go wrong with this piece if equipment.
customer_reviews.author: 1goldtoof

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Home Gym
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and visited a lot of stores looking at different equipment. This rack is more sturdy and came with more features than racks priced at $100-200 more. It came in 4 boxes. Each box was very sturdy and reinforced along the edges. Assembly did take several hours. The instructions are very well written, though I’d advise paying close attention because I had to do a few steps over because I didn’t do that. I highly recommend this for home gyms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete product
customer_reviews.text: Paid over $977 for this product with lat pull down attachment and shipping included. Did not receive the lat pull down attachment. I would just spend the money for better Product.
customer_reviews.author: jmendez

customer_reviews.title: Great Box but need more J Hooks
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing & it is SOLID. I am 6'1" about 215# and it is like an oak tree. Easy to put together(yeah by myself) My only gripe is you get two sets of hook but the one set is too long for my liking. As soon as Fitness Reality can point me to the purchase of another pair or two of the shorter J Hooks this would be a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: A good piece of gear
customer_reviews.text: I just recently purchased this with the pull down attachment, It was very easy to assemble took about 2 1/2 hours that was including the pulldown attachment. The cage is very sturdy, I’m 6 foot three 215 pounds and I was able to perform pull-ups and chin-ups without rattling the cage.It has enough space to perform all your exercises and it looks good. The only issue I found so far is adjusting the safety bars and the different positions but that’s not a major thing. Overall outstanding product and worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This power cage is very very sturdy, stable. Doesnt move at all. The lat pull is great. Looks great too. The instructions were very good. Had no issues setting it up alone in my garage. Excellent customer service! I bought a power cage from Amazon, had issue with one of the part. I contacted the customer service and they were very prompt to send me the part without any delay. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: usil2008

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I dont even know where to start...i was going to buy a Rouge wall gym but the wife showed me this and i took a chance because i would be saving $1000 minimum. BOY did she ever pick the right one!! i train athletes 6 days a week, so it gets heavy usage. only complaint i have is that i have to buy different bar holders because the ones supplied face the same direction . Overall freaking awesome home gym!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jarrun Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great product, great support (after about 10 calls in a row to get someone to finally answer)
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for about a month now, and I absolutely love it. Every time I get a flyer in the mail for a local gym I'm relieved that for what equals a few months of membership, I have my own gym. Great value, great product, and was able to assemble it on my own.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Cage!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic cage. Very well designed, made from good material. Packaging was excellent. It does take some time to build, but you will not be disappointed when done. I was going to go a cheaper cage, but so glad I spend more for this one. I also got the lat attachment which is very well built and tracks smooth. Overall excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan G.

customer_reviews.title: Best gym I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best gym I've ever owned!! Love it!! Sturdy construction where you can just feel it. Doesn't sway one bit. The safety spotter allows me to go to failure on pretty much any exercise. I did a lot of shopping prior to buying and this gym offered more bang for your buck imo. Highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Allan M Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Overall great! Have used for 2+ months with no problem. Assembled with “help” of young kids for added challenge to take twice as long. Could be very easy to build with two able adults. Product is solid. No regrets
customer_reviews.author: TD2020

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Works great for shibari and lifting , I use with rogue Ohio barbell , does not fit Olympic 2inch pegged holders would strongly recommend buying 2-4 inch memory foam for jhooks and safety bars to lessen the noise , totally worth the $450 price tag compared to other frames, would strongly recommend buying US steel bolts though just to be extra safe
customer_reviews.author: Ken M

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect home gym rack
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged. Not a single blemish on anything. Which is very rare when it comes to heavy exercise equipment and shipping. The instructions are very easy to follow. The rack itself is very easy to assemble, even just by myself. Once together the rack is very sturdy. The only minor 'complaints' I have are the absence of J-hooks (1" hole size on a 2x3 rack isn't very common), no plate storage, the unit could be taller all around (people 6' and over will be flat foot when grasping the pull up bar), and the safety bars more tricky to move around than I would think necessary. Other than that I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: One of my primary reasons for purchasing this cage was the lat pull-down option. The assembly of the cage took several hours, however, I was alone and I'm very detail-oriented and deliberate, so it was not an unreasonable set-up time. All parts were packaged very well. No issues with damages at all. Most of the assembly time was spent simply unpacking the parts. I am very critical, and I must say I am very happy with this purchase. Excellent value and very solid cage. I highly recommend. I purchased for $610 through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for the price but the hooks could be better
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product and super sturdy for the price;however, was a little disappointed how over sized the j hooks were. They stick out a little too far. Going to see if I can find some smaller ones that don't impede range of motion.
customer_reviews.author: K Smyth

customer_reviews.title: By far the best value for the money
customer_reviews.text: By far the best value for the money. I have looked for cages for quite a while, it seems I either paid a reasonable price but the product wasnt going to feel very stable under the weight, or paid a HUGE premium for anything heavy duty. Had it several months now and this thing is a tank. The attachments are all extremely heavy duty, feel secure, it's just an all around great buy and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... pegs to go in the holes is not as easy as it should be
customer_reviews.text: Works well but the horizontal safety bars are a pain in the butt to adjust because trying to line up the pegs to go in the holes is not as easy as it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Well made cage. Everyone really likes it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made product. For the price, I don’t think you can beat it. I like the way the chin up handles are made. Perfect angle.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: This thing has everything i need
customer_reviews.text: I quit the gym and bought this. It has everything i need. I'm a heavy lifter and this rack handles all my heavy lifts just fine bench over 315 and 500 squats just fine. Pull ups are great very solid doesn't move around. Can do biceps on the pully as well as triceps. No more gym membership.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cable attachment BS!
customer_reviews.text: Rack itself isn’t bad but literally first use of cables the bare cable separated from the rubber coating. Ridiculous for a rack this expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for buck.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I believe I caught it for a sale because I paid $500 for it and it’s listed on their site for $600. Assembly took about 2.5-3 hours. Just did about an hour and a half workout using it and I’m pretty satisfied so far. Hoping to find some accessories for it Update: it’s been a few weeks and I’m completely satisfied. Just wish there were more compatible accessories and attachments
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble but time consuming
customer_reviews.text: High quality, easy to assemble but time consuming, worth it though. I can tell it's going to stand the test of time. I like that I can add on other equipment when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I had to wait because it was a week late then when it finally came It was missing parts so I’m getting a refund. I wish that this product came with all the parts because I really thought it was a great product from what I’ve read. I’m very disappointed in this rack.
customer_reviews.author: Dante W.

customer_reviews.title: this thing is a beast love it
customer_reviews.text: came well packaged in multiple boxes everything taped up and well protected, took me longer to unpackage it than to assemble it, very easy to assemble, very easy instructions, and this thing is solid, doesn't move and inch highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations, the quality is incredible and everything ...
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations, the quality is incredible and everything assembled together perfectly. Being able to do lat pull downs and triceps push downs at home totally makes this purchase worth it to me, highly recomended!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick AZ

customer_reviews.title: Great rack, worth the extra.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome rack. Ton of cool features, very well constructed, looks great. Easy to assemble and seems super stable. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Haines

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a bad ass piece of equipment! Bought this right before the shelter in place orders were put in for covid-19. I don’t miss the gym with set up because it has everything I need! This is probably the nicest free weight and cable rack I’ve come across for this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: We purchased the unit before Christmas 2017 and it was easy to set-up
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding! My entire family loves this unit! So versatile and the craftsmanship is top shelf! We purchased the unit before Christmas 2017 and it was easy to set-up. The unit came with step-by-step guidance. Commercial grade!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my husband and he loves it. This thing is amazing! Super sturdy, solid construction, smooth glide with the lat/row bar. Side safety bars take a little finesse to adjust but over all I can't believe the quality at this price. I would definitely recommend this product from this seller. Items arrived within days of purchase. The pieces did smell of smoke and had smoke dust on them when unpacking. Somewhere at some point, wherever this was stored, had a fire, and this item was spared.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Perricone

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Overall not a bad piece of equipment but the safely bars are an absolute pain to adjust on the fly and take at times minutes to line up the holes correctly on either side.
customer_reviews.author: Paul in NM

customer_reviews.title: Best home gym and best cage ever
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a much better cage than any gym I’ve been to. You might be a little limited if you’re a tall person but for my height this cage is the best
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Moselina

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: definitely I can say without a doubt that (no matter how experienced you are) you will be thrilled with this one. absolutely love this rack.
customer_reviews.author: guitar guy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, pulldown is smooth
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for fitting weight lifting into my crazy busy schedule. Get the pulldown accessory and between the cage and dumbells you have hundreds of options. I love our local club but i now save the drive time and the money.
customer_reviews.author: Leper Khan

customer_reviews.title: Commercial Gym Qaulity
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Awesome machine. Rock sturdy. Super easy to put together. Instructions were very well laid out! Can't go wrong with this one. All honesty. I couldn't imagine a machine being better built than this. Legitimately commercial gym qaulity!
customer_reviews.author: Terry L. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great workout cage for home gym.
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase of 2020 Quarantine. Great value for price and use for workouts. I would agree with sales assessment listed for product. My son put it together without trouble and we are both getting much use out of this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Bagnieski

customer_reviews.title: you pay what you got.
customer_reviews.text: great product so far, i also bought the hulkfit power cage at the same time, but I return the hulkfit, and decided to keep this one, it worth the money,
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Love this cage
customer_reviews.text: Love this cage... First off the cage is made of high quality materials. Assembly is easy with great instructions and even the screws are broken up in steps that go along with the instructions. Setup will take a couple hours by yourself but it is not difficult. If you are looking for a cage to work out you cannot beat this product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JWILKIE

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!! I promise you won’t regret it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and very solid!! I created a maple platform and hope to bolt it down next week!! It looks and feels amazing!!! It looks very sharp!! I highly recommend you build a platform for it!!! It’s like less than $100!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gaudy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this squat cage. Easy to assemble (took me about 2 hrs by myself), super sturdy. This thing isn't going anywhere. Twice the squat cage that my local fitness store was offering for the same $600!
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cable.  Frayed already.
customer_reviews.text: Cable frayed already. Wow. How cheap can it be? A year into it and it’s already not usable.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent squat rack at an unbelievably low price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. If you’re really tall, this might not be for you. Would also recommend a torque wrench set for assembly.
customer_reviews.author: FreddyWap

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't hesitate to recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot express how please we are with this equipment! Not only is the quality first class, but so was the packaging and ease of assembly! Step by step instructions! We bought the weight bench as well, and it is all top quality!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Vincent

customer_reviews.title: instructions were excellent. I highly recommend you purchase a metric socket ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is well built, instructions were excellent. I highly recommend you purchase a metric socket set (Or impact wrench) to save a lot of time. The "tools" included with this are a joke. If you are handy it will take longer to unpack everything than setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: MittenMayhem

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and best cage in the market
customer_reviews.text: That’s all you need to get big!! This thing is perfect and amazing quality
customer_reviews.author: gari

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality. Couldn’t be happier with my purchase. I’m no handyman and I put it together by myself without any issues. Definitely recommend adding the lat pull down bar. Glides like the ones at the gym and can also position low for rowing and curls.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Brian Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Received it for Xmas as a gift and the exercise equipment is amazing! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: MaryBeth Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy i picked this product, i was comparing it to others, and i am glad for my decision, first of all , package showed up days earlier than expected, instructions were very simple, and i love the quality, it is very solid,
customer_reviews.author: MISOLIS

customer_reviews.title: Truly a gym for professionals in a small footprint
customer_reviews.text: Da bomb. Lay pull down and pull up and extra large square tube parts are exceptions in this price. Extras allow many exercises, former power lifter and weight lifter who has seen it all, this will do you until you need to lift 1,000 pounds! Lots of attachments .
customer_reviews.author: T U

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for the extremely easy setup alone
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for the extremely easy setup alone. Does not require two people and the parts are very well packaged and organized. The rack is very sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: JG43

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gym
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build. Will need two people. Amazing for all gyms. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: MDG

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I will meet my new years goals with our new basement gym.
customer_reviews.author: Whenursmiln

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete product
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts, so I am unable to build it. Thought it was a great product from what I’ve read. I’m very disappointed in this rack.
customer_reviews.author: jrrangel300

customer_reviews.title: Great product - Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks. I love mine, its VERY sturdy, wasnt too bad to setup, and overall is fantastic. I bought the lat pull down, and greased it according to the instructions, and have had no problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this product however, I noticed, after putting it together, one of the metal plates is missing and there's no customer service to fix the situation.
customer_reviews.author: Shihan

customer_reviews.title: Great rack for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great rack for the price! Just a little below commercial gym quality. Very easy to put together. I'd recommend getting a socket wrench set if you don't have one.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Solid cage, smooth lat machine
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Solid cage, easy to assemble . Lat machine is smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Xterra 2002 Owner

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I assembled this with very little assistance from a second person.. very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Tiffany Heckman

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of home gym equipment. Met all expectations of my husband and me. Took awhile to install, but once it was done, we have used it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome rack
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome rack. Very sturdy. The instructions were right on. Came with everything in pic including bars for lat pull down and low row.
customer_reviews.author: L.T.

customer_reviews.title: Went together pretty quickly. Looks great
customer_reviews.text: This thing is rock solid. The "Light Commercial" attribute is legit. Went together pretty quickly. Looks great. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hagerman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and works great this far!
customer_reviews.text: This is used for my home gym and works great. Assembly was easy and straight forward. I have not tested the weight limit yet, but had worked with the 200+lbs I currently use.
customer_reviews.author: informed

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Gym-quality power cage. Very happy with purchase. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: First class unit.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to put together. My kids and I are using the heck out of it. One of the beams came with a small dent in it and the company replaced it for us.
customer_reviews.author: John D Busch

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is the best squat rack. I looked around at every brand and I am so glad I bought this one. I’ve had for about a year now and it’s holding up great !!
customer_reviews.author: High gz

customer_reviews.title: A best buy
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble. It is very stable and strong. A great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: SOLID piece of equipment. tight build
customer_reviews.text: Well built, nice coating, heavy and sturdy, just add a landmine attachment and Invest in an Olympic bar, and your good to go. :)
customer_reviews.author: F. Galanis

customer_reviews.title: This is definitely good quality equipment
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely good quality equipment. I would recommend using your own tools to assemble to speed things up. It comes with two small wrenches. Equipment was packed securely and arrived on as scheduled. Assembled fairly easy. It appears built to last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Paula S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to assemble with two people. Ships in multiple packages. Only drawback is dip bar seems to excessively twist metal where it connects to safety bar. 4.5/5 stars. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Parsloe

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived in the best packaging I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in the best packaging I have ever seen. Each piece was wrapped individually with great care. Not a scratch on any of the parts and it went together perfectly. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Patti

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best pieces of equipment I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best pieces of equipment I've ever purchased. It took me about 4.5 hours to assemble, but it was really easy. The instructions are very succinct, the parts are well packaged and protected and the bolts/nuts are all compartmentalized by Steps. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: B. Van Gilder

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awsome!! Better then I imagined. The rack and parts are very sturdy and the cable attachments moves very smooth. Pretty pricey but we'll worth the quality
customer_reviews.author: Nic church

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging, easy to read instructions. So far it looks and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Colin B

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Literally one of my favorite things I have ever bought. Extremely high quality.

customer_reviews.title: Zero technical support.
customer_reviews.text: No customer support or service. Selling the equipment and supporting it thru the life cycle is part of the quality of product. I wouldn't recommend selling expensive equipment without any technical support.
customer_reviews.author: Techie

customer_reviews.title: Came in four boxes, easy to build
customer_reviews.text: Instructions beyond helpful, everything was super easy. Shipped fast and came with everything. Zero problems
customer_reviews.author: Phóreal

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality and the instructions to assemble are very clear.
customer_reviews.author: J. Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rack for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good rack and the pull down attachment is smooth. Overall very stable unit and the weld quality appears great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great squat rack!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, directions were detailed, And the squat rack is sturdy. This squat rack is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Zero Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: The cage itself was great, except for the fact that one of the safety catches did not fit into the cage, thus making it useless. I have tried contacting their customer support through email and by calling and have not gotten a single response. Their customer support is non-existent. Do not buy this cage and make the same mistake that I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: We love this !! Our whole family uses it thanks
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Yes sir 👌
customer_reviews.text: So good so far loving every part of this Rack and lat pulldown attachment!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Such a great rack super sturdy, easy to do all types of workouts.
customer_reviews.author: David Rasuli

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We have a lighter duty power rack and we bought this one. All I can say is that this one is worth every penny. Every part of this rack is thicker and the welds appear high quality (good ripple, no gaps, no slag). While this rack is more expensive than some power racks you could buy I will be recommending this one because it is much larger and more sturdy by far than the cheap ones we have seen/purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C.

customer_reviews.title: It's a Tank
customer_reviews.text: If you are deciding between this and something cheaper, spend the extra money and get this thing. I would say it rivals most gyms I've been to and it'll handle all the weight you need.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Z.

product_meta.title: Fitness Reality X-Class Light Commercial High Capacity Olympic Power Cage
feature_bullets: 1500 lbs of real weight capacity with 2" x 3" tubular steel frame construction. A BONUS pair of J-Hooks included
Two adjustable 2"x 20" high Density rubber grip dip handles with user weight capacity of 600 lbs; Rubber strip covered safety bars prevents scratches, denting and any loud banging noises
Two 11.5" safety bars and two 35.5" dual mounted safety bars with each set combined weight capacity of 1500 lbs. Compatible with 7' Olympic bars
2 height position adjustable multi-grip chin up/pull up bars with a weight capacity of 600 lbs. Predrilled holes for bolting the Cage to any floor
Included Olympic lat pull down and low row cable attachment for strengthening the upper back, shoulders and arms
